## SsmParameters class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

CDK construct that declares parameters in Parameter Store on AWS Systems Manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SsmParameters extends Construct 
```
**Extends:** Construct

## Remarks

This construct won't actually provision parameters.

The parameter path will be either of: - `/passquito/{config}/RP_ORIGIN` without [SsmParametersProps.group](./passquito-cdk-construct.ssmparametersprops.group.md) - `/passquito/{group}/{config}/RP_ORIGIN` with [SsmParametersProps.group](./passquito-cdk-construct.ssmparametersprops.group.md)

`config` is `"default"` by default.
